T02TD1248E:201a-1: bha ga b'an he badzra tattva tsa turkra ma s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02TD1248E:201a-3: bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs de kho na nyid bzhi'i rim pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1248E:201a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1248E:201a-5: thabs dang shes rab gnyis med he ru ka / bdag med lha mo bcas la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02TD1248E:201a-6: de nyid thob cing dad dang skal yod par //
T02TD1248E:201a-7: de nyid bzhi yi rim pa bri bar bya ;
T02TD1248E:201a-8: / snying rje chen pos 'gro la dang por blta //
T02TD1248E:201a-9: gso sbyong dag nas rgyud rnams rim pas sbyangs //
T02TD1248E:201a-10: rgyud 'di'i dkyil 'khor zhugs shing dbang dag blangs //
T02TD1248E:201a-11: de nyid shes shing bkas gnang gnas bzhi bsgom //
T02TD1248E:201a-12: dur khrod la sogs dben dang nyams dga' bar //
T02TD1248E:201a-13: sna tshogs rdo rje'i gdan la legs gnas pa //

T02TD1248E:201b-0: legs gnas rten la bdud rtsi sgron ma @201b lnga ;
T02TD1248E:201b-1: / me tog la sogs mchod dang gtor ma btang //
T02TD1248E:201b-2: zhing skyes sogs dang legs sbyang rig ma dang //
T02TD1248E:201b-3: grogs bzang rten dang gcig pu dogs med sgrub //
T02TD1248E:201b-4: bdag nyid snying ga'i sa bon h'u% nag las //

T02TD1248E:201b-11: tsoo r'i dmar mo rang byung me tog thogs //
T02TD1248E:201b-12: be t'a l'i ni ser mo chu phyag ma //

T02TD1248E:201b-14: pukka s'i sngo phyag na sha sna tshogs //
T02TD1248E:201b-15: sha ba r'i dkar sna tshogs ro yi phyag / tsanda l'i dmar sgra rin chen tshogs //
T02TD1248E:201b-16: nang gi sku gsum bde ba chen pos mchod //
T02TD1248E:201b-17: dom bi phyag rgya rang gi sku la 'khyud //

T02TD1248E:201b-19: sdig bshags yi rang bsngo dang lus dbul dang //
T02TD1248E:201b-20: lam bstan pa dang gsol ba gdab pa dang //

T02TD1248E:201b-23: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod la sngags kyi don de dran pa las bdag gi de kho na nyid gnas par bya'o //
T02TD1248E:201b-24: chos nyid de las ra% dang h'u% //
T02TD1248E:201b-25: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dra gur dang //
T02TD1248E:201b-26: de las ae las chos 'byung bsgom //

T02TD1248E:201b-28: rang sems kyis bsgyur gzhal yas khang //
T02TD1248E:201b-29: thar pa'i grong mchog rnam par snang //

T02TD1248E:201b-34: sangs rgyas zhing rgyas mchod pa'i tshogs //
T02TD1248E:201b-35: dur khrod brgyad na shing brgyad sogs //
T02TD1248E:201b-36: ha ra tsu ta aa sho ka / aa shvattha dang ka ra na dza //
T02TD1248E:201b-37: dza li ta dang par ti par //
T02TD1248E:201b-38: be te bha tra phyogs dang mtshams //
T02TD1248E:201b-39: zhing skyong phyogs skyong lha dang klu //
T02TD1248E:201b-40: zhing skyong brgyad kyi zhal dang mdog / phyogs skyong brgyad dang mdog de bzhin //
T02TD1248E:202a-0: @202a * // gri gug thod pa g-yas dang g-yon //
T02TD1248E:202a-1: gtor len zhing dag legs par skyong //
T02TD1248E:202a-2: brgya byin dkar po glang po'i bdag / rdo rje dril bu g-yas dang g-yon //
T02TD1248E:202a-3: gshin rje mthing nag ma he zhon //
T02TD1248E:202a-4: dbyung pa thod pa de bzhin no //

T02TD1248E:202a-7: gnod sbyin ser po rta la zhon //
T02TD1248E:202a-8: dpal 'bras ne'u le g-yas dang g-yon //
T02TD1248E:202a-9: 'byung po'i bdag po dkar po ni //

T02TD1248E:202a-11: me lha dmar po ra la zhon //
T02TD1248E:202a-12: spyi blugs dbyu gu rtse gsum bsnams //
T02TD1248E:202a-13: srin po kham nag mi ro'i khri //
T02TD1248E:202a-14: gri dang thod pa g-yas dang g-yon //
T02TD1248E:202a-15: rlung lha dud kha sha ba zhon /
T02TD1248E:202a-16: g-yas na ba dan zhags pa g-yon /
T02TD1248E:202a-17: thams cad rin chen rgyan ldan te //
T02TD1248E:202a-18: srin po rus pas brgyan pa po //
T02TD1248E:202a-19: chung ma bu 'khor phyogs mdog bcas //
T02TD1248E:202a-20: mdog rnams zhi byed chos legs skyong //
T02TD1248E:202a-21: steng gi mkha' la lha chen brgyad //
T02TD1248E:202a-22: shar du brgya byin sngon dang 'dra //
T02TD1248E:202a-23: lho ru tshangs pa gser gyi mdog / spyi blugs dbyu gu rtse gsum 'dzin //
T02TD1248E:202a-24: nub tu khyab 'jug dmar po ste //
T02TD1248E:202a-25: 'khor lo g-yas dang g-yon dud dang //
T02TD1248E:202a-26: byang du lha chen thal ba'i mdog / rtse gsum thod pa g-yas dang g-yon //
T02TD1248E:202a-27: dbang ldan gzhon nu drug gi bu //
T02TD1248E:202a-28: dkar po mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa //

T02TD1248E:202a-30: g-yas g-yon la phug la du 'dzin //

T02TD1248E:202a-32: rlung du legs ldan nag po ni //
T02TD1248E:202a-33: ral gri g-yas na phub ni g-yon //
T02TD1248E:202a-34: thams cad lha rgyan dag dang ldan //
T02TD1248E:202a-35: 'dod pa'i lha rnams kyis bskor nyi zla gza' //
T02TD1248E:202a-36: 'og nas klu brgyad phyogs dang mtshams //
T02TD1248E:202a-37: 'jog po dung skyong rigs ldan dang //
T02TD1248E:202a-38: mtha' yas pad chen dga' bo dang //
T02TD1248E:202a-39: nor rgyas bu dang padma rnams //
T02TD1248E:202a-40: phyogs skyong mdog dang sbrul zhags g-yas //
T02TD1248E:202a-41: gdengs ka dang ldan padma g-yon //
T02TD1248E:202a-42: sprin brgyad chu brgyad mchod rten brgyad //
T02TD1248E:202a-43: bya dang gcan gzan ro yi tshogs //
T02TD1248E:202a-44: grub pa'i mchog thob rnal 'byor bzhugs //
T02TD1248E:202a-45: gzhal yas nang du padma brgyad //
T02TD1248E:202a-46: rdo rje phreng ba nag pos bskor //
T02TD1248E:202a-47: dkar ser r'a ga dmar dang gnag /
T02TD1248E:202b-0: @202b phyogs dang rtsig pa'i rim par gnas //
T02TD1248E:202b-1: dbus su bdud bzhi nyi mas mnan //
T02TD1248E:202b-2: 'dab ma lha brgyad zla bas mnan //
T02TD1248E:202b-3: nyi steng h'u% dang aom nag bsgom //
T02TD1248E:202b-5: me long zla ba shes rab gzugs //

T02TD1248E:202b-7: steng du k'a li nyis 'gyur las //

T02TD1248E:202b-9: mnyam nyid nyi ma thabs kyi gzugs //

T02TD1248E:202b-13: gcig gyur sku ni chos kyi dbyings //
T02TD1248E:202b-14: sku ni mthing nag chen po nyid //
T02TD1248E:202b-15: zhal brgyad zhabs bzhi phyag bcu drug / dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'khyil //
T02TD1248E:202b-16: steng zhal dud mdog mche ba gtsigs //
T02TD1248E:202b-17: rus pa'i 'khor lo spyan gsum dmar //

T02TD1248E:202b-19: dbus zhal gzhan rnams sku yi mdog / spyan dmar gsum gsum mche ba gtsigs //
T02TD1248E:202b-20: sna tshogs rdo rje thod pa'i thod //
T02TD1248E:202b-21: rna cha mgul rgyan dpung pa'i rgyan //
T02TD1248E:202b-22: phyag gdub zhabs gdub rus pas brgyan //
T02TD1248E:202b-24: stag gi sham thabs thal bas byugs //
T02TD1248E:202b-25: rdo rje dril bu dang po'i phyag / yum la legs par 'khyud pa'o //
T02TD1248E:202b-26: g-yas kyi gnyis pas ral gri 'dzin //
T02TD1248E:202b-27: de nas mda' dang 'khor lo gshor //
T02TD1248E:202b-28: dbyug pa rtse gsum lcags kyu rim //
T02TD1248E:202b-29: g-yon ni rim bzhin padma gzhu //
T02TD1248E:202b-30: kha tv'am thod pa rin po che //
T02TD1248E:202b-31: sdigs mdzub zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1248E:202b-32: yum ni sku mdog yab dang mnyam //

T02TD1248E:202b-34: rdo rje dril bu yab la 'khyud //
T02TD1248E:202b-35: gnyis ni mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD1248E:202b-36: thod skam lnga bcu'i phreng bas brgyan //
T02TD1248E:202b-37: rgyan rnams rus pa yab dang mnyam //

T02TD1248E:202b-39: brgya byin tshangs pa nye dbang drag / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis mnan pa'i //
T02TD1248E:202b-40: steng nas 'jigs dang sgeg pa gshe //
T02TD1248E:202b-41: bzhad drag snying rje rngam dang zhi //
T02TD1248E:202b-42: gar dgus rnam par gyur par bsgom //

T02TD1248E:202b-45: h'u% h'u% h'u% karyam ku ru shva me /
T02TD1248E:203a-0: aom badzra ma h'a dve sha @203a * //
T02TD1248E:203a-1: tsa tura a'a nan da d'a ya ka kha ga mu khe ka ra so n'a tha /
T02TD1248E:203a-2: h'u% h'u% h'u% karyam ku ru shva me /

T02TD1248E:204a-11: gti mug zhe sdang ser sna rnams //
T02TD1248E:204a-12: 'dod chags phrag dog bdag med ma //
T02TD1248E:204a-13: rdo rje'i ming can lha mo drug / bskul sbyangs byas nas lha mor bsgom //
T02TD1248E:204a-14: phyag rgya lnga dang gri gug thod //
T02TD1248E:204a-15: thams cad g-yon brkyang bsgom par bya //
T02TD1248E:204a-16: mtshog ma snying ga mgrin pa ru //
T02TD1248E:204a-17: aom dkar a'a: dmar h'u% nag las //
T02TD1248E:204a-18: kha dog gsum gyi gru gug las //
T02TD1248E:204a-19: bskul sbyangs sku gsum byin brlabs las //
T02TD1248E:204a-20: sa spyod mkha' spyod bdag med ma //
T02TD1248E:204a-21: dkar dmar nag po gri gug 'dzin //
T02TD1248E:204a-22: phyag rgya lnga ldan ro yi gdan //
T02TD1248E:204a-23: g-yon brkyang sgeg dang bcas pa bsgom //
T02TD1248E:204a-24: yang ni rang snying sa bon las //
T02TD1248E:204a-25: 'od zer lnga spros bskul sbyangs byas //
T02TD1248E:204a-26: bla ma dkyil 'khor rgyal ba rnams //
T02TD1248E:204a-27: khro bo rig pa'i lha mor bcas //
T02TD1248E:204a-28: mchod pa gsum gyis legs mchod la //
T02TD1248E:204a-29: dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1248E:204a-30: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shi nytsa tu m'am //
T02TD1248E:204a-31: mi bskyod la sogs sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1248E:204a-32: spyan ma la sogs sku las byung //
T02TD1248E:204a-33: bdud rtsi bum pa lha dbang bskur //
T02TD1248E:204a-34: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shr'i ye h'u%/
T02TD1248E:204a-35: sgrib gnyis sbyangs nas rgyas gdab pa //
T02TD1248E:204a-36: bdag dang goo r'i pu kka s'i //
T02TD1248E:204a-37: bcom ldan mi bskyod legs par bzhugs //
T02TD1248E:204a-38: sha pa r'i dang tsoo r'i la //
T02TD1248E:204a-39: rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin bzhugs //
T02TD1248E:204a-40: tsa nda l'i dang be tt'a l'i //
T02TD1248E:204a-41: rin chen 'byung ldan bsgom par bya //
T02TD1248E:204a-42: dom bi dang ni gha sma r'i //
T02TD1248E:204a-43: dbu la snang ba mtha' yas bzhugs //
T02TD1248E:204a-44: de nas bdud rtsi myang bar bya //
T02TD1248E:204a-45: shar lho dur khrod nam mkha' la //
T02TD1248E:204a-46: sgom bzhi yi dbu stengs su //
T02TD1248E:204b-0: rnam par snang @204b mdzad rim bzhin bsgom //
T02TD1248E:204b-1: ya% ra% aa% gsum h'a% nag aom //
T02TD1248E:204b-2: mas yar rim pas bsgom par bya //
T02TD1248E:204b-3: h'u% brjod rang snying h'u% 'od kyis //
T02TD1248E:204b-4: h'um bskul ma drung dkyil 'khor dang //
T02TD1248E:204b-5: mgo bo gsum dang padma brgyad //
T02TD1248E:204b-6: sa bon bcas pa'i thod pa bsgom //
T02TD1248E:204b-7: de bzhin h'u% 'od yab bskul bas //
T02TD1248E:204b-8: aa yi 'od kyis sa bon rnams //
T02TD1248E:204b-9: gyur nas bdud rtsir gyur pas ni //
T02TD1248E:204b-10: h'u% las rnam sprul bhr'u% las dri //
T02TD1248E:204b-11: dzr'im las dkar po aam las dmar //
T02TD1248E:204b-12: kham las chur 'gyur phyogs kyi ri //
T02TD1248E:204b-13: nam las mi sha ham las rta //
T02TD1248E:204b-14: nam las glang po sham las ni //
T02TD1248E:204b-15: ce spyang gam las ba glang sha //
T02TD1248E:204b-16: h'u% gi me sbar bdud rtsi bskol //
T02TD1248E:204b-17: aa yi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lhung //
T02TD1248E:204b-18: h'u% nyid rdo rje gyur nas ni //
T02TD1248E:204b-19: lan lngar 'phar zhing dkrugs byas nas //
T02TD1248E:204b-20: rdo rje h'u% dang aom 'od des //
T02TD1248E:204b-21: ye shes bdud rtsi spyan drangs 'dres //
T02TD1248E:204b-22: lha rnams ljags la h'um nyid las //
T02TD1248E:204b-23: rdo rje sbu gus bdud rtsi myang //
T02TD1248E:204b-24: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa mri ta badzra sva bha ba a'a tma ko& ham //
T02TD1248E:204b-25: de nas mchod pa'i lha mo rnams //
T02TD1248E:204b-26: dkyil 'khor lha la rim bzhin mchod //
T02TD1248E:204b-27: mchod pa'i go rims la sogs pas //
T02TD1248E:204b-28: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul //
T02TD1248E:204b-29: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dz'a badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1248E:204b-30: rig pa'i lha mo thams cad kyis //
T02TD1248E:204b-31: dkyil 'khor lha la bstod pa mdzad //
T02TD1248E:204b-32: lha mo'i dkyil 'khor bcom ldan bskor //
T02TD1248E:204b-33: g-yo dang mi g-yo khyod kyis thugs //
T02TD1248E:204b-34: sems can kun gyi don mdzad rnams //
T02TD1248E:204b-35: bcom ldan mchog tu dgyes rdo rje //
T02TD1248E:204b-36: zhal gyi thugs kyi dgongs pa grub //
T02TD1248E:204b-37: thugs dgyes mdzod cig dgyes rdo rje //
T02TD1248E:204b-38: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta stu ti badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tma ko& ham /
T02TD1248E:204b-39: brtan par gyur nas 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD1248E:204b-40: lha rnams phyogs phyogs spro bya ste //
T02TD1248E:204b-41: nam mkha'i mthar thug 'gro ba rnams //
T02TD1248E:204b-42: dkyil 'khor lha ru gsal bar bsgom //
T02TD1248E:204b-43: brtan par gyur nas tshur bsdus la //
T02TD1248E:204b-44: rang nyid dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom //
T02TD1248E:204b-45: las kyi rgyal po'i 'khor lo mchog / de ni lha yi de nyid yin //
T02TD1248E:204b-46: bla ma la brnyas dad med sngags la rlom //
T02TD1248E:204b-47: glegs bam mthong bas khengs shing dbang bskur dman //
T02TD1248E:204b-48: de la sgra yi tshig kyang brjod mi bya //
T02TD1248E:204b-49: dad ldan de nyid bzhi thob gus par sgrub la brtson //
T02TD1248E:205a-0: bla ma'i lung thob drin dran @205a * //
T02TD1248E:205a-1: bla ma la gus de dag ni //
T02TD1248E:205a-2: de ni ri dbang rtse las lhung gyur pa //
T02TD1248E:205a-3: ltung bar mi bya snyam yang ltung bar 'gyur //
T02TD1248E:205a-4: sdig bral ye shes rim pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD1248E:205a-5: lha'i de kho na nyid kyi rim pa ste dang po'o /
T02TD1248E:205a-7: // / da ni ye shes kyi de kho na nyid bshad de //
T02TD1248E:205a-8: thams cad rang gi sems yin pas //
T02TD1248E:205a-9: lha rnams rang la bsdus pa ni //
T02TD1248E:205a-10: ji ltar me long dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1248E:205a-11: has btab rim pas 'du ba bzhin //
T02TD1248E:205a-12: rta gdong la sogs sgom bzhi //
T02TD1248E:205a-13: yan lag bzhi la bsdu bar bya //
T02TD1248E:205a-14: lha mo brgyad ni zhal la bsdu //
T02TD1248E:205a-15: zhal dang phyag rnams rim bzhin te //
T02TD1248E:205a-16: bdag yul zhal re phyag gnyis pa //
T02TD1248E:205a-17: gzhan nas brten pa'i 'khor lo bzhi //
T02TD1248E:205a-20: mi dgag rgyud don man ngag yin //
T02TD1248E:205a-21: 'dir ni bla ma'i man ngag gis //
T02TD1248E:205a-22: lha yi lung thob dang 'dra ba //
T02TD1248E:205a-23: bar dor phyag rgya chen po 'thob //
T02TD1248E:205a-24: gsang ba'i padma mtshan nyid dang //
T02TD1248E:205a-25: sems dang ye shes 'dres gyur pa'i //
T02TD1248E:205a-26: mngon par byang chub rim pa dag / ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal //
T02TD1248E:205a-27: byang chub rim pa'i rdo rje can //
T02TD1248E:205a-28: gnas bzhi la ni yang dag brten //
T02TD1248E:205a-29: yid du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu //
T02TD1248E:205a-30: bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni //
T02TD1248E:205a-31: 'dod chags la sogs rim spangs te //
T02TD1248E:205a-32: brtan dang g-yo ba'i dngos kun la //
T02TD1248E:205a-33: snying rje phan par bsams nas su //
T02TD1248E:205a-34: mnyam pa'i sems ni bskyed par bya //
T02TD1248E:205a-36: de bzhin gsang ba'i padma ste //
T02TD1248E:205a-37: cha dang mdog ni sna tshogs dang //
T02TD1248E:205a-38: de bzhin du ni gzhan dag ste //
T02TD1248E:205a-39: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis //
T02TD1248E:205a-40: chos kyi dbyings kyi rol ba'o //
T02TD1248E:205a-41: bsdus te gong bu'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1248E:205a-42: rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur //
T02TD1248E:205a-43: chu dang me yi khams dag ni //
T02TD1248E:205a-44: ro gcig 'gyur bas go 'phang mchog / shes rab thabs dang sbyor ba las //
T02TD1248E:205a-45: dbang po drug po sangs rgyas nyid //
T02TD1248E:205a-46: yang dag bstan bcos de nyid shes //
T02TD1248E:205a-47: slob dpon lung gis rjes 'gro zhing //
T02TD1248E:205a-48: gsang chen de nyid don bsgom pa //
T02TD1248E:205a-49: gcig nas brgyud de de nyid can //
T02TD1248E:205a-50: stong pa de nyid la sogs mtshan //
T02TD1248E:205a-51: thams cad sngon bzhin mtshan byas nas //
T02TD1248E:205b-0: dri ma bkrus @205b pa'i lus kyis ni //
T02TD1248E:205b-1: mngon par byang chub rim pas grol //
T02TD1248E:205b-2: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02TD1248E:205b-3: ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya //
T02TD1248E:205b-5: kun da zla ltar dkar ba'i mdog / zhabs gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas //
T02TD1248E:205b-6: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1248E:205b-7: sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can //
T02TD1248E:205b-8: phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas //
T02TD1248E:205b-9: nyid kyi thugs kar bsdams par mdzad //
T02TD1248E:205b-10: gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs pa yi //
T02TD1248E:205b-11: ye shes padma'i gdan du bsam //
T02TD1248E:205b-12: snying ni chu shing me tog 'dra //
T02TD1248E:205b-13: lte ba nas ni 'phyangs te gnas //
T02TD1248E:205b-14: sngon bzhin padma rgyas par brgyan //
T02TD1248E:205b-15: 'dab ma brgyad kyis brgyan pa yi //
T02TD1248E:205b-16: ge sar dang ni zla ba bcas //
T02TD1248E:205b-17: sa bon yi ge dgod par bya //
T02TD1248E:205b-18: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa //
T02TD1248E:205b-19: zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar po'i mdog / dri chen dbus su bsgom par bya//
T02TD1248E:205b-20: de yi dbus su rnam shes dang //
T02TD1248E:205b-21: ye shes gnyis su med par bsgom //
T02TD1248E:205b-22: sngon du byams pa ldan pa yi //
T02TD1248E:205b-23: shar gyi 'dab mar mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1248E:205b-24: snying rje chen po lho sgo ru //
T02TD1248E:205b-25: rin chen de nyid sa bon no //
T02TD1248E:205b-26: dga' ba nub sgo'i 'dab ma la //
T02TD1248E:205b-27: 'od dpag med kyi sa bon dgod //
T02TD1248E:205b-28: btang snyoms byang gi 'bab ma la //
T02TD1248E:205b-29: don yod gtso bo bsam par bya //
T02TD1248E:205b-30: stong pa mtshan nyid med pa las //
T02TD1248E:205b-31: dbyangs yig shar sogs sa bon ni //
T02TD1248E:205b-32: zla phyed thig ler ldan pa dag / gos dkar ldan pa'i rim bzhin dgod //
T02TD1248E:205b-33: mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi po ru //
T02TD1248E:205b-34: sngon du bstan pa'i ma ning dgod //
T02TD1248E:205b-35: de yi dbus su rang gi sems //
T02TD1248E:205b-36: yi ge nyid du bsgom par bya //
T02TD1248E:205b-37: stong pa mtshan nyid med pa las //
T02TD1248E:205b-38: ji ltar yi ge bsgom par bya //
T02TD1248E:205b-39: sems ni ya mtshan skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1248E:205b-40: bcom ldan bshad pa ji ltar lags //
T02TD1248E:205b-41: de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa //
T02TD1248E:205b-42: ji bzhin de nyid rdo rje nyon//
T02TD1248E:205b-43: stong pa'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa las //
T02TD1248E:205b-44: chu shing me tog bdud rtsi bzhin //
T02TD1248E:205b-45: snying po med pa'i snying por 'gyur //
T02TD1248E:205b-46: dbus kyi rnam shes ye shes te //
T02TD1248E:205b-47: ye shes rang bzhin gzugs med cing //
T02TD1248E:205b-48: mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid can //
T02TD1248E:205b-49: dri ma med pa'i ye shes sku //
T02TD1248E:206a-2: kha dog gzugs dang yi ge med //
T02TD1248E:206a-3: gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus dag tu //
T02TD1248E:206a-4: rnal 'byor can gyis de nyid gzung //
T02TD1248E:206a-5: mnyam pa nyid kyi sems kyis ni //
T02TD1248E:206a-6: mtshan nyid ji bzhin bsgom par bya //
T02TD1248E:206a-7: de yi rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam /
T02TD1248E:206a-8: bla ma nyid kyi lung bzhin du //
T02TD1248E:206a-9: da ni myur du mthong bar 'gyur //
T02TD1248E:206a-10: rnam shes ye shes gzugs dag ni //
T02TD1248E:206a-11: bstan bcos las ni mtshan nyid bstan //
T02TD1248E:206a-12: de nyid kho na dpa' bos bshad //
T02TD1248E:206a-13: 'od zer dkar pos brgyan pa dag //
T02TD1248E:206a-14: 'di ni rtag tu bsgom par bya //
T02TD1248E:206a-15: sgeg pa lnga yi mchod rten la //
T02TD1248E:206a-16: bdud rtsi sa bon bsams nas ni //
T02TD1248E:206a-17: 'od zer dkar po gsal ba'i mdangs //
T02TD1248E:206a-18: bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag pa las //
T02TD1248E:206a-19: snying ga'i padma'i ge sar la //
T02TD1248E:206a-20: mthe bong tsam gyi zlum po la //
T02TD1248E:206a-21: de yi dbus su sa bon ni //
T02TD1248E:206a-22: a'a li k'a li dag las btung //
T02TD1248E:206a-23: mdog dkar de ni shin tu mdzes //
T02TD1248E:206a-25: de yi dbus kyi sgo rnams la //
T02TD1248E:206a-26: thig le bsgom pa rab tu grags //
T02TD1248E:206a-27: skra yi rtse mo brgya yi cha //
T02TD1248E:206a-28: rdul phran gzugs su rtag tu gnas //
T02TD1248E:206a-29: rnam par shes pa'i dngos po yi //
T02TD1248E:206a-30: mtshan nyid mtshon pa'i ye shes can //
T02TD1248E:206a-31: sems kyi mtshan nying mi shes pas //
T02TD1248E:206a-32: thig le gnas kyi go 'phang blta //
T02TD1248E:206a-33: snying dang tshangs pa'i sgo dang ni //
T02TD1248E:206a-34: thigs pa lam gyi sgo dag tu //
T02TD1248E:206a-35: bla ma'i lung la gus pa yis //
T02TD1248E:206a-36: rnam shes ye shes gzung bar bya //
T02TD1248E:206a-37: phyi rol pa yi lam dag dang //
T02TD1248E:206a-38: bstan bcos las ni mi rnyed cing //
T02TD1248E:206a-39: bstan pa yang ni rnyed slar te //
T02TD1248E:206a-40: de sbyor bas ni rnyed par dka' //
T02TD1248E:206a-41: bla ma'i bsnyen bkur gus pa yis //
T02TD1248E:206a-42: thabs dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos //
T02TD1248E:206a-43: bla ma'i zhal gyi lam gyis ni //
T02TD1248E:206a-44: mkhas pas 'di ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1248E:206a-45: mi g-yo 'tshe ba med pa ru //
T02TD1248E:206a-46: mnyam par gzhag ste dngos po bsgom //
T02TD1248E:206a-47: chos kyi sngon 'gro yid yin te //
T02TD1248E:206a-48: yid kyis 'jug cing yid kyis 'dag / yid kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis //
T02TD1248E:206a-49: smra ba dag ni byed pa 'byung //
T02TD1248E:206a-50: de bas thams cad yid rang bzhin //
T02TD1248E:206a-51: blo ldan yid las byung zhes bya //
T02TD1248E:206a-53: snying gi bsam dang bsgom pa ste //
T02TD1248E:206b-0: sdom dang rgyud 'gyur sa @206b bon ni //
T02TD1248E:206b-1: de nyid kho na gzugs med do //
T02TD1248E:206b-2: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sa bon ni //
T02TD1248E:206b-3: ye shes de nyid mthong ba med //
T02TD1248E:206b-4: gzugs sogs srid pa'i 'dod spyod la //
T02TD1248E:206b-5: sa bon lnga ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1248E:206b-6: kun nas kun du 'jug pa dang //
T02TD1248E:206b-8: rtag tu rtsa ba gzer bar bya //
T02TD1248E:206b-9: ye shes rnam shes sa bon ni //
T02TD1248E:206b-10: thig le'i sgra dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1248E:206b-11: srid pa'i longs spyod 'dod pa yis //
T02TD1248E:206b-12: ngag gi yi ge spangs nas ni //
T02TD1248E:206b-13: yid kyis bzlas dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1248E:206b-14: rtag pa chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi //
T02TD1248E:206b-15: mi g-yo go 'phang rgyun du gnas //
T02TD1248E:206b-16: rtag tu 'phang zhing gos med pas //
T02TD1248E:206b-17: ye shes la ni rnam shes thim //
T02TD1248E:206b-18: rnam shes ye shes nyid 'gyur na //
T02TD1248E:206b-19: byang chub rim pa mthong 'gyur zhes //
T02TD1248E:206b-20: mar me lta bu thams cad la //
T02TD1248E:206b-21: snang 'gyur mtshan ma dang po ste //
T02TD1248E:206b-22: srin bu me khyer lta bu dang //
T02TD1248E:206b-23: rdul mthong mtshan ma gnyis pa yin //
T02TD1248E:206b-24: nyon mongs 'joms pa'i mtshan nyid gdags //
T02TD1248E:206b-25: rdul phran dkar po'i rnam par ni //
T02TD1248E:206b-26: phyogs su de bzhin mthong 'gyur ba //
T02TD1248E:206b-27: rtags ni gsum pa yin par shes //
T02TD1248E:206b-28: 'dod pa lha yi longs spyod rnams //
T02TD1248E:206b-29: sems kyis mthong ba bzhi pa ste //
T02TD1248E:206b-30: gzugs kyi lha mthong lnga pa yin //
T02TD1248E:206b-31: gzugs med spyod yul drug pa ste //
T02TD1248E:206b-32: chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa bdun //
T02TD1248E:206b-33: sangs rgyas 'bras bu brgyad pa ste //
T02TD1248E:206b-34: rnal 'byor pas ni ma yengs bsgom //
T02TD1248E:206b-35: snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1248E:206b-36: rtse gcig bsgoms na mchog thob 'gyur //
T02TD1248E:206b-37: ye shes bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1248E:206b-38: gang du 'pho ba'i man ngag ni //
T02TD1248E:206b-39: bla ma'i brgyud pa yod la blang //
T02TD1248E:206b-41: gang zhig dad med brtson med blun po shes rab med //
T02TD1248E:206b-42: bla ma'i skyon blta nyes brjod g-yo sgyus bla ma bslus //
T02TD1248E:206b-43: tshogs su mi blta lkog tu brnyas byed 'dzum tshig smra //
T02TD1248E:206b-44: bu dang rgyal po dge slong rigs bzang yin yang spang //
T02TD1248E:206b-45: skyon rnams spangs pa'i gzugs spyod ma yin la //
T02TD1248E:206b-46: bla ma la gus snying rje gzhan phan shes rab thabs dang ldan //
T02TD1248E:206b-47: spyod lam rnam bzhir mi yengs bsgom la brtson zhing rim par ston //
T02TD1248E:206b-48: de lta bu la sngags kyi de nyid legs par bstan par bya //
T02TD1248E:207a-1: shes kyi de nyid kyi rim pa ste gnyis pa'o /
T02TD1248E:207a-3: // / de nas sngags kyi mtshan nyid bshad //
T02TD1248E:207a-4: rnal 'byor ba rnams rtag tu bzla //
T02TD1248E:207a-5: sngags dang yi ge tha mi dad //
T02TD1248E:207a-6: gnyis med rtag tu bzla ba ni //
T02TD1248E:207a-8: snying gis bsam dang bsgom pa ste //
T02TD1248E:207a-9: rdo rje rgyu gyur sa bon ni //
T02TD1248E:207a-10: de kho na ni gzugs med do //
T02TD1248E:207a-11: rang gi snying gar sa bon la //
T02TD1248E:207a-12: bsam gtan sngags kyis bskor la bzla //
T02TD1248E:207a-13: aom de wa pi tsu badzra h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1248E:207a-15: aom aa sht'a na n'a ya /
T02TD1248E:207a-16: pim ga au rdha ke sha ba rtma na /
T02TD1248E:207a-17: tsa tu rbim sha ti ne tr'a ya //
T02TD1248E:207a-18: sho da sha bhu dz'a ya //
T02TD1248E:207a-19: kri shna dz'i m'u ta wa pu she /
T02TD1248E:207a-20: ka p'a la m'a l'a ne k'a dh'a ri ni /
T02TD1248E:207a-21: a'a dhm'a ta kr'u ra tsi tt'a ya /
T02TD1248E:207a-22: aa rdhe ndu dam sht'i ne /
T02TD1248E:207a-23: aom m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02TD1248E:207a-24: k'a ra ya k'a ra ya /
T02TD1248E:207a-25: ga rdzdza ya ga rdzdza ya /
T02TD1248E:207a-26: ta rdzdza ya ta rdzdza ya /
T02TD1248E:207a-27: sho sha ya sho sha ya /
T02TD1248E:207a-28: sa pta s'a ga r'a na /
T02TD1248E:207a-30: n'a ga aa shta k'a na /
T02TD1248E:207a-33: ha h'a hi h'i hu h'u he hee ho hoo ham ha: phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1248E:207a-35: aom badzra ghu dzu si ta pa ra ma lo ke shva re ka p'a la /
T02TD1248E:207a-36: m'a la dha ri ni ru dhi pri ye na pa si hum phat sv'a h'a //
T02TD1248E:207a-38: aom badzra tsa nde shv'a ri kha tv'am gi ma h'a badzra ka p'a la m'a la ku ho //
T02TD1248E:207a-40: sarba du sht'am hri da ya /
T02TD1248E:207a-41: a'a ka ddhya bhu h'um phat sv'a h'a //
T02TD1248E:207a-43: aom badzra be tt'a l'i kha kha kh'a h'i sarba du shtam bi ka ta /
T02TD1248E:207a-44: be she ta ri ni bi kri ta a'a lam k'a ra bh'u shi ta /
T02TD1248E:207a-48: pi lam pa sa ma nu sm'a ra /
T02TD1248E:207a-49: pra sha ya mantal ma te /
T02TD1248E:207a-50: au ta pa ya sarba h'u% h'u% h'u% sv'a h'a //
T02TD1248E:207a-52: aom badzra ma he shva ri ham ham ham ham ru lu bhyo h'u% phat /
T02TD1248E:207a-53: pa khra yam sarba du sht'a n'im ni rma tha ya h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1248E:207a-55: aom badzra ha bha ba ti badzra gu dza sha ra ba h'um /
T02TD1248E:207a-56: pi tsi ta bi shi ta ri na /
T02TD1248E:207a-57: sarba ta th'a ga t'a dzu sthe sa ma ya ma nu sm'a ra ha na ha na /
T02TD1248E:207a-60: a'a be sha sarba bh'u tam ta /
T02TD1248E:207a-61: na dha na dha sa ta ya /
T02TD1248E:207a-65: aom pi sh'a tsi pa rna sha ba r'i sarba ma ri ram pra sha ma ni /
T02TD1248E:207a-66: h'u% h'u% h'u% mo ha pu ta ri h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1248E:207a-68: aom badzra su lam ni bhi nda sarba du sht'am hri da ya /
T02TD1248E:207a-73: ni rma tha ra ya bi lam ba /
T02TD1248E:207a-74: sa ma ya ma nu sm'a ra h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1248E:207b-0: aom badzra ba ra ma ghu dzee ka sa la bi bh'u shi ta sarba du sht'am mo ha ni pri @207b ye ;
T02TD1248E:207b-1: dzye hi ga pa ti badzra bh'u dze sa ri bha h'u%/
T02TD1248E:207b-2: bam bam ba sa pa ri ni sarba du sht'am /
T02TD1248E:207b-5: aom badzra ba da ba mu kham yo ge shva ri hi hi hi hi dza: h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1248E:207b-8: aom badzra dam yu b'a r'a ha mu kh'i tram h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1248E:207b-10: aom badzra s'a dhu sam dze li ni ma h'a ya ksha ni ksha ni r'u pa ni ma h'a pha la ya ni ra na te /
T02TD1248E:207b-11: k'a ma ru ba ti tam tra da ho h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1248E:207b-13: aom tsa ndra s'u rya h'u% tr'a sa ni sim ha ni rte sim ha ba ga te /
T02TD1248E:207b-14: sam he ni tam tam tam bam bam h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1248E:207b-15: seng ge gdong la sogs pa'i sngags so //
T02TD1248E:207b-35: aom hya gri ba h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1248E:207b-37: aom badzra s'u ra gri ba h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1248E:207b-39: aom ku ku ra gri ba h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1248E:207b-41: aom badzra sidha gri ba h'u% phat sv'a h'a //
T02TD1248E:207b-42: seng gdong ma la sogs pa'i snying po ring po'o //
T02TD1248E:207b-43: rnal 'byor zlos la brtson pa yis //
T02TD1248E:207b-44: gnas la phyag 'tshal yi ge lnga//
T02TD1248E:207b-45: zhi ba'i thig le dbyibs mdog brlan //
T02TD1248E:207b-46: bde ba mi rtog stong pa nyid //
T02TD1248E:207b-47: mi rtog stong pa gnyis su med //
T02TD1248E:207b-48: bla ma'i man ngag sa la bzla //
T02TD1248E:207b-49: bla ma tha mal par mthong dug sel bdud rtsi spong //
T02TD1248E:207b-50: rigs dang bsnyen bkur gyis khengs 'jig rten chos brgyad tshol //
T02TD1248E:207b-51: de 'dra'i slob ma 'ong ba snying rjes dge ba de yang bzung //
T02TD1248E:207b-52: dal 'jam brtson zhing bka' sgrub thos bsam sgom pa pos //
T02TD1248E:207b-53: rigs gnas 'byor pa dgos kyang de ni gzung sbyang bya //
T02TD1248E:207b-54: dbang bskur rgyud bshad sngags dang gdams ngag bstan par 'os //
T02TD1248E:207b-55: sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi rim pa ste gsum pa'o /
T02TD1248E:207b-58: // / da ni bdag gi de kho na nyid bshad //
T02TD1248E:207b-59: de nyid shes pas mnyam gzhag med //
T02TD1248E:207b-60: dngos po rnams ni thams cad kyi //
T02TD1248E:207b-61: rnam dag de bzhin nyid du brjod //
T02TD1248E:207b-62: phyi nas re re dbye ba yis //
T02TD1248E:207b-63: lha rnams rnam par dag par bya //
T02TD1248E:207b-64: mi shes sgrib g-yogs rnam sbyangs nas //
T02TD1248E:208a-2: rigs lnga yum lnga rdo rje ma //
T02TD1248E:208a-3: gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga dang bcu //
T02TD1248E:208a-4: brgya stong khri 'bum bye ba dag / grangs med sku yi gsang ba bsam mi khyab //
T02TD1248E:208a-5: gsung dang thugs kyi gnyis med bsam mi khyab //
T02TD1248E:208a-6: rnal 'byor rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1248E:208a-7: lus med rdo rje can de nyid //
T02TD1248E:208a-8: shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog / khams gsum 'di dag thams cad ni //
T02TD1248E:208a-9: rmi lam sgyu ma ji bzhin du //
T02TD1248E:208a-10: chos brgyad rtog pa ring du dor //
T02TD1248E:208a-11: gnyis med mi rtog nges par bya //
T02TD1248E:208a-12: pha rol phyin drug spyod pa yis //
T02TD1248E:208a-13: sangs rgyas dngos grub myur du 'grub //
T02TD1248E:208a-14: sems can mi rtog sgyu mas byas //
T02TD1248E:208a-15: chos kyi dbyings la bdag spyod pas //
T02TD1248E:208a-16: grogs po med par gcig pur rgyu //
T02TD1248E:208a-17: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02TD1248E:208a-18: ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya //
T02TD1248E:208a-19: ji ltar bdud rtsi don gnyer ba //
T02TD1248E:208a-20: snying po blangs nas tshigs ma 'dor //
T02TD1248E:208a-21: de bzhin bdud rtsi lnga rnyed nas //
T02TD1248E:208a-22: rtog pa thams cad spangs nas su //
T02TD1248E:208a-23: sangs rgyas thams cad bstan pa bzhin //
T02TD1248E:208a-24: rtog med ting 'dzin longs spyod bya //
T02TD1248E:208a-25: rgyud rnams kun nas rgyal bas bstan //
T02TD1248E:208a-28: rtog pa med na grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD1248E:208a-29: phyag rgya chen po'i gnas su 'gro //
T02TD1248E:208a-30: de bas rnal 'byor bdag nyid ni //
T02TD1248E:208a-31: de ni yang dag don rig pas //
T02TD1248E:208a-32: snying rje 'gro don bsam pa can //
T02TD1248E:208a-33: dmigs pa med par brtan par dpyad //
T02TD1248E:208a-34: dogs med seng ge bzhin du rgyu //
T02TD1248E:208a-35: 'on kyang slob dpon smad mi bya //
T02TD1248E:208a-36: rdo rje spun la mi mgu min //
T02TD1248E:208a-37: rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig rnams //
T02TD1248E:208a-38: gtan med sgyu mas spang bya zhing //
T02TD1248E:208a-39: de nyid bcu shes bskyed rdzogs kyis //
T02TD1248E:208a-40: thams cad mkhyen pa bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1248E:208a-41: rnal 'byor chen po sna tshogs ye shes rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su brgyan //
T02TD1248E:208a-42: la las nyon mongs zhi byed lam bzang lam can lus ngag yid sgrub 'bras bu ni ;
T02TD1248E:208a-43: / sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za'i grong 'dra ting 'dzin dag la blo gnas pas //
T02TD1248E:208a-44: 'dod chags la sogs nad can ye shes sgyu ma'i sman gyis bdag gzhan gso bar bya //
T02TD1248E:208a-45: bdag byin brlab pa man ngag dag / gang gis bla ma las ma bsgrubs //
T02TD1248E:208a-46: rtag dang chad pa la dmigs pas //
T02TD1248E:208b-0: mi de @208b phyir log gyur pa yin //
T02TD1248E:208b-1: mchod pa thams cad rnam spangs nas //
T02TD1248E:208b-2: bla ma mchod pa yang dag brtsam //
T02TD1248E:208b-3: de mnyes pas ni kun mkhyen pa'i //
T02TD1248E:208b-4: ye shes mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1248E:208b-5: bla med thob pa'i slob dpon ni //
T02TD1248E:208b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' mchod byas pas //
T02TD1248E:208b-7: de yis bsod nams ma byas shing //
T02TD1248E:208b-8: bka' thub ma bsnyen gang zhig yod //
T02TD1248E:208b-9: de nyid mi zad 'dod pa yis //
T02TD1248E:208b-10: shin tu dga' ba gang dang gang //
T02TD1248E:208b-11: shin tu khyad par can de nyid //
T02TD1248E:208b-12: de dang de nyid bla mas byin //
T02TD1248E:208b-13: bla ma yis ni sdig pa 'phrog / slob dpon gyis ni 'jigs pa sel //
T02TD1248E:208b-14: slob dpon gyis ni sdug bsngal gyi //
T02TD1248E:208b-15: rgya mtsho 'jigs las pha rol sgrol //
T02TD1248E:208b-16: gang zhig nga rgyal gyis khengs shing //
T02TD1248E:208b-17: yang dag man pa sun 'byin dang //
T02TD1248E:208b-18: de nyid chos brnyes bcas pa la //
T02TD1248E:208b-19: de la de nyid bstan pa min //
T02TD1248E:208b-20: bla ma la gus bden par smra //
T02TD1248E:208b-21: rnam par mkhas shing rgyud gcig la //
T02TD1248E:208b-22: dam tshig spyod pa bsrung ba dag / rim pa de la bstan par bya //
T02TD1248E:208b-23: bdag gi de kho na nyid kyi rim pa ste bzhi pa'o /
T02TD1248E:208b-25: // / de nyid bzhi bsgom rnal 'byor pa'i //
T02TD1248E:208b-26: sgrib sbyang bar chad zhi ba dang //
T02TD1248E:208b-27: tshogs bsags mkha' spyod 'pho ba'i phyir /
T02TD1248E:208b-28: chos skyong mkha' 'gro gtor ma byin //
T02TD1248E:208b-29: shar gyi dur khrod nam mkha' la //
T02TD1248E:208b-30: chos 'byung sum brtsegs bar ma ni //
T02TD1248E:208b-31: lte bar mam las sa yi lha //
T02TD1248E:208b-32: gser mdog bum pa 'dzin byed ma //
T02TD1248E:208b-33: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1248E:208b-34: pad zla'i gdan la legs bzhugs ma //
T02TD1248E:208b-35: mkha' yi yi dags tshogs kyis bskor //
T02TD1248E:208b-36: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dang mtshams //
T02TD1248E:208b-37: dur khrod bstan pa phyogs skyong 'khor //
T02TD1248E:208b-38: steng gi padma'i lte ba la //
T02TD1248E:208b-39: bam las tshangs pa gdong bzhi gser gyi mdog / g-yas na mi 'jigs 'phreng ba 'dzin //
T02TD1248E:208b-40: g-yon na spyi blugs rtse gsum 'dzin //
T02TD1248E:208b-41: gzugs khams lha yis bskor nas bzhugs //
T02TD1248E:208b-42: pam las padma'i lte ba la //
T02TD1248E:208b-43: phu las padma dkar po dkar //
T02TD1248E:208b-45: phyogs mtshams klu chen brgyad po ni //
T02TD1248E:208b-46: dur khrod bstan pa lta bur bsgom //
T02TD1248E:209a-3: dza: h'u% bam ho: rim brjod nas //
T02TD1248E:209a-4: goo r'i la sogs lha mo yis //
T02TD1248E:209a-5: dgug gzhug gnyis med gyur nas kyang //
T02TD1248E:209a-6: phyogs skyong 'khor bcas thugs kyi rigs //
T02TD1248E:209a-7: mi bskyod rang nyid dur khrod brgyan //
T02TD1248E:209a-8: mthing nag rdor dril yum dang bcas //
T02TD1248E:209a-9: zhal gcig g-yas brkyang bsgom par bya //
T02TD1248E:209a-10: lha rnams sku yi rigs yin te //
T02TD1248E:209a-11: dkar po dur khrod rgyan dang ldan //
T02TD1248E:209a-12: rdo rje dril bu yum dang bcas //
T02TD1248E:209a-13: zhal gcig g-yas brkyang bsgom par bya //
T02TD1248E:209a-14: klu brgyad gsung rigs dmar po ste //
T02TD1248E:209a-15: 'od dpag rang bzhin dur khrod rgyan //
T02TD1248E:209a-16: mdog dmar rdor dril yum dang bcas //
T02TD1248E:209a-17: zhal gcig g-yas brkyang bsgom par bya //
T02TD1248E:209a-18: rang rang rgyan dang sku gsung thugs //
T02TD1248E:209a-19: lce rnams rdo rje sbu gus myang //
T02TD1248E:209a-20: bdag nyid bdud rtsi myangs par blta //
T02TD1248E:209a-21: gtor ma gsum ni byin brlabs la //
T02TD1248E:209a-22: phyogs skyong rnams la dbul ba ni //
T02TD1248E:209a-23: aom ai nda dza ma dza la /
T02TD1248E:209a-24: dza kkha bh'u ta ba hni b'a au r'a kkha /
T02TD1248E:209a-25: tsa nda su dzdza m'a da pappa ta la p'a t'a la aa shtha sa ppa sv'a h'a /
T02TD1248E:209a-28: dzim gha phu lla dh'u ppa m'am sa pim ga aa mba sa bba ka dzdza sa da kh'a nti khu ni phat g'a da /
T02TD1248E:209a-29: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rm'a n'am /
T02TD1248E:209a-30: a'a dya nu tpa nna tv'a ta /
T02TD1248E:209a-31: aom a'a: h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1248E:209a-33: aa bo l'a mummu ni re kakko l'a /
T02TD1248E:209a-34: gha ne kri pi ta ho b'a dzdza ai /
T02TD1248E:209a-35: ka ru ne ki aa ai na ro l'a /
T02TD1248E:209a-36: ta him ba la kh'a dzdza ai /
T02TD1248E:209a-37: gha dhem ma aa n'a pidzdza aa ai /
T02TD1248E:209a-38: ha le k'a lim dza ra pa ni aa ai /
T02TD1248E:209a-40: tsa au sa ma k'a tthu ri si hla /
T02TD1248E:209a-43: m'a la ai ndha nam s'a li nydza /
T02TD1248E:209a-45: bha ru kh'a ai aa ai /
T02TD1248E:209a-46: phrem kha na khe ta ka rante /
T02TD1248E:209a-47: shu dh'a shu ddha na mu ni aa ai /
T02TD1248E:209a-48: ni r'am shu aam ge tsa t'a wi aa ai /
T02TD1248E:209a-49: ta him dza sa r'a ba pa ni aa ai /
T02TD1248E:209a-50: ma la ya dza kundu ru ba tta ai /
T02TD1248E:209a-51: di ndi ma ta hinna b'a dzdza aa ai //
T02TD1248E:209a-52: zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i glus so //
T02TD1248E:209a-53: yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ste /
T02TD1248E:209a-55: aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
T02TD1248E:209a-57: badzra satva tve no pa ti shtha /
T02TD1248E:209a-59: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02TD1248E:209a-60: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02TD1248E:209a-61: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02TD1248E:209a-62: sarba siddhi mme bra ya tstsha /
T02TD1248E:209a-64: tsi ttam shre ya: ku ru h'u%/
T02TD1248E:209a-67: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa /
T02TD1248E:209b-1: ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa:/
T02TD1248E:209b-2: rang nyid lhar bsgoms lag gnyis kyis //
T02TD1248E:209b-3: padma'i phyag rgya bskor bar bya //
T02TD1248E:209b-4: h'u% h'u% h'u% gsum brjod dril bu dkrol //
T02TD1248E:209b-5: rdor dril thal mo thugs kar sbyar //
T02TD1248E:209b-6: snying rje chen po bskyed nas ni //
T02TD1248E:209b-7: rdo rje glu blang smon lam gdab //
T02TD1248E:209b-8: mchog gsum sdig dang sgrib med cing //
T02TD1248E:209b-9: 'dod chags la sogs skyon dang bral //
T02TD1248E:209b-10: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs //
T02TD1248E:209b-11: de bzhin nyid la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1248E:209b-12: chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur mdzes //
T02TD1248E:209b-13: gnyis spros gnyis sbyang gnyis su med //
T02TD1248E:209b-14: lus can don du sgyu mas spyad //
T02TD1248E:209b-15: dngos po bral ba bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1248E:209b-16: sems can thams cad sdig med cing //
T02TD1248E:209b-17: sems can thams cad bde gyur cig //
T02TD1248E:209b-18: sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad gyur cig / lam de nyid nas zhugs nas kyang //
T02TD1248E:209b-19: ma brgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang //
T02TD1248E:209b-20: ma grol ba rnams grol bar shog / rnal 'byor chos dang dam tshig la //
T02TD1248E:209b-21: da lta nyid du gnas par shog / g-yon pa khu tshur snying gar gzhag / phyag g-yas brkyang ste gshegs gsol ba //
T02TD1248E:209b-22: sarba gha ta ni grihna grihna h'u% phat /
T02TD1248E:209b-23: aom a'a: h'u% mu: bsam gtan mi sbyor nyal mi nus //
T02TD1248E:209b-24: thabs dang shes rab pha rol phyin //
T02TD1248E:209b-25: ldang tshe lha mo'i glus bskul zhing //
T02TD1248E:209b-26: langs nas khrus byed dbang bskur bsam //
T02TD1248E:209b-27: gtor ma mandala mchod sogs rnams //
T02TD1248E:209b-28: bskur ba bcas pas bya ba yin //
T02TD1248E:209b-29: bza' ba phud dbul bdud rtsi myang //
T02TD1248E:209b-30: spyod lam rnam bzhir ci spyod pa //
T02TD1248E:209b-31: de nyid bzhi yi rim pas spyad //
